blobs.changelog:
- Increase wifi scan result buffers
- Optimize webgui loading time.
- Bump platform.
- Fix bug with energy import in reduced mode (bug introduced in 54aa555).
- Add support for JSON payload in reduced mode.
- Add Telegram rate limit feature.
- Remove word 'solar' from calculated power metrics.
- Add calculcated power metrics option in reduced mode.
- Add 35A fuse option.

- Add new HA device class reactive_energy and reactive_power for reactive energy and power sensors. Note that HA release 2025.6 or newer is required!
- Add support for username and password authentication for MQTT mTLS connections.
- Minor optimizations in the firmware in different areas.
